  • Constructor Details

    • Spider

      public Spider(String team)
      Sets the spider's image
      Parameters:
      team - The team side the spider should spawn from. "Left" for left side, "Right" for right side.

  • Method Details

    • addedToWorld

      public void addedToWorld(greenfoot.World w)
      Sets the rotation of the spider and sets where it'll appear after going into the tubes. Also plays a sound effect upon spawning.
      Overrides:
      addedToWorld in class greenfoot.Actor
      Parameters:
      w - The world that the spider is added in.

    • act

      public void act()
      Act - do whatever the Spider wants to do. This method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment.
      Overrides:
      act in class greenfoot.Actor
